content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":253492,"originalJapaneseLine":"いや、そんな事はないぞ。よく見て見ろ","translatedEnglishLine":"No, that's not the case. Take a good look."},{"lineNumber":253493,"originalJapaneseLine":"昼間の戦いが長引けば長引くほど苦しくなるようだぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"The longer the battle drags on during the day, the tougher it seems to become."},{"lineNumber":253494,"originalJapaneseLine":"むむ・・確かに","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm... indeed."},{"lineNumber":253495,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、ゆっくり戦う余裕なんてこっちもない","translatedEnglishLine":"But we don't have the luxury to fight slowly either."},{"lineNumber":253496,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人ケッセルリンクを倒した","translatedEnglishLine":"Defeated the demon Kesselring."},{"lineNumber":253497,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t死ぬ間際にメイド達とお別れ","translatedEnglishLine":"Said farewell to the maids just before dying."},{"lineNumber":253498,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tロレックス、アミトスがチュパ病から復帰","translatedEnglishLine":"Rolex and Amitos recovered from Sucking Disease."},{"lineNumber":253499,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tヘルマン軍は魔軍を撃退した","translatedEnglishLine":"The Helman army repelled the demon army."},{"lineNumber":253500,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t昨夜の出来事","translatedEnglishLine":"The events of last night."},{"lineNumber":253501,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tシィルとシーラからケッセルリンクの弱みを聞く","translatedEnglishLine":"Heard about Kesselring's weakness from Seel and Sheila."},{"lineNumber":253502,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t誰か不幸娘として侵入させて奴を殺す","translatedEnglishLine":"Have someone infiltrate as the unlucky girl and kill him."},{"lineNumber":253503,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tペルエレと目が合う","translatedEnglishLine":"Caught eyes with Peruere."},{"lineNumber":253504,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tトランシルバニアの森","translatedEnglishLine":"The forest of Transylvania."},{"lineNumber":253505,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t一人で放置されたペルエレ、ピンチになるが","translatedEnglishLine":"Peruere was left alone and got into trouble,"},{"lineNumber":253506,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t使徒メイド達に保護される","translatedEnglishLine":"but was protected by the Apostle Maids."},{"lineNumber":253507,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t数日が過ぎた","translatedEnglishLine":"Several days passed."},{"lineNumber":253508,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t使徒メイドと共に過ごしペルエレ","translatedEnglishLine":"Peruere spent time with the Apostle Maids."},{"lineNumber":253509,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tさらに数日が過ぎた","translatedEnglishLine":"Several more days passed."},{"lineNumber":253510,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔人ケッセルリンクに認められ","translatedEnglishLine":"Peruere was recognized by the demon Kesselring,"},{"lineNumber":253511,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t使徒なったペルエレ","translatedEnglishLine":"and became an Apostle."},{"lineNumber":253512,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t充実した日々を過ごしペルエレの元に","translatedEnglishLine":"Spent fulfilling days at Peruere's side."},{"lineNumber":253513,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tフレイアが現れ任務を告げる","translatedEnglishLine":"Freya appeared and gave the mission."},{"lineNumber":253514,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\tペルエレは魔人側に付く事を選んだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Peruere chose to side with the demons."},{"lineNumber":253515,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\t作戦成功を信じて侵入して来た","translatedEnglishLine":"Believing the operation would succeed, infiltrated."},{"lineNumber":253516,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\tランス達は全滅する","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others were annihilated."},{"lineNumber":253517,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\tペルエレの誘導で安全に侵入","translatedEnglishLine":"Safely infiltrated under Peruere’s guidance."},{"lineNumber":253518,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\tメイド達は眠らされ、罠も解除","translatedEnglishLine":"Maids were put to sleep and traps disarmed."},{"lineNumber":253519,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\tケッセルリンクは起きていた","translatedEnglishLine":"Kesselring was awake."},{"lineNumber":253520,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\t起きているケッセルリンク","translatedEnglishLine":"Kesselring remains awake."},{"lineNumber":253521,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\t戦闘開始","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle begins."},{"lineNumber":253522,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\tメイド達を捕まえる","translatedEnglishLine":"Captured the maids."},{"lineNumber":253523,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tヘルマン地区での戦況説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle situation report in the Helman district."},{"lineNumber":253524,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t人類側は押してはいるが","translatedEnglishLine":"Human forces are pushing forward, but..."},{"lineNumber":253525,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t飛行魔物兵に手こずっていた","translatedEnglishLine":"They were having trouble dealing with the flying demon soldiers."},{"lineNumber":253526,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランス達がラングバウに到着した","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and others arrived at Langbau."},{"lineNumber":253527,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t首都に近寄る飛行魔物兵はシーラが撃墜","translatedEnglishLine":"Sheila shot down the flying demon soldiers approaching the capital."},{"lineNumber":253528,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t数日前の出来事","translatedEnglishLine":"Events from a few days ago."},{"lineNumber":253529,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tルメイを倒したらクリームとセックス","translatedEnglishLine":"When Lemay is defeated, Cream and sex."},{"lineNumber":253530,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tという約束を強引にしていた","translatedEnglishLine":"Forced such a promise."},{"lineNumber":253531,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tルメイは奥地に居て倒すの難しい","translatedEnglishLine":"Lemay is deep inside, making it difficult to defeat her."},{"lineNumber":253532,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t魔物将軍をルメイと偽ってとか考える","translatedEnglishLine":"Thought about pretending the demon general was Lemay."},{"lineNumber":253533,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tとりあえずテニアン丘陵を目指す","translatedEnglishLine":"For now, aim for the Tenian Hills."},{"lineNumber":253534,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、テニアンの魔軍陣地","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time, the demon army camp at Tenian."},{"lineNumber":253535,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tルメイが最前線に視察に現れた","translatedEnglishLine":"Lemay appeared at the front lines for an inspection."},{"lineNumber":253536,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tその頃、テニアンの魔軍陣地","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, at the demon army camp in Tenian."},{"lineNumber":253537,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tルメイが傍若無人な屠殺を楽しんでいる","translatedEnglishLine":"Lemay is enjoying a wanton slaughter."},{"lineNumber":253538,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t人破壊爆弾を積んだエノラゲイが飛び立つ","translatedEnglishLine":"An Enola Gay loaded with human-destroying bombs takes off."},{"lineNumber":253539,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t焼け落ちた町に入る","translatedEnglishLine":"Enter the burned-down town."},{"lineNumber":253540,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tロレックス率いる５軍も同行","translatedEnglishLine":"The 5th army led by Rolex is also accompanying."},{"lineNumber":253541,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t５軍と共に移動中の魔人討伐隊","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon extermination squad moving with the 5th army."},{"lineNumber":253542,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tニネティー村に向かう飛行魔物兵を見つける","translatedEnglishLine":"Found flying demon soldiers heading to Ninety Village."},{"lineNumber":253543,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t５軍と共に移動中の魔人討伐隊","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon extermination squad moving with the 5th army."},{"lineNumber":253544,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tバース村に向かう飛行魔物兵を見つける","translatedEnglishLine":"Found flying demon soldiers heading to Bath Village."},{"lineNumber":253545,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t町に向かう飛行魔物兵を発見","translatedEnglishLine":"Discovered flying demon soldiers heading for the town."},{"lineNumber":253546,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t今度は１体だけ","translatedEnglishLine":"This time, only one."},{"lineNumber":253547,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\tその頃、ローレングラード","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, in Lawrengrad."},{"lineNumber":253548,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\t人破壊爆弾投下","translatedEnglishLine":"Human-destroying bomb dropped."},{"lineNumber":253549,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\t\t\t都市壊滅","translatedEnglishLine":"City devastated."},{"lineNumber":253550,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tテニアン丘陵に到着","translatedEnglishLine":"Arrived at the Tenian Hills."},{"lineNumber":253551,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t\tランスの策略を聞き、ロレックス怒る","translatedEnglishLine":"Rolex gets angry hearing about Rance's plan."}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、そんな事はないぞ。よく見て見ろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, that's not the case. Take a good look.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昼間の戦いが長引けば長引くほど苦しくなるようだぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The longer the battle drags on during the day, the tougher it seems to become.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むむ・・確かに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... indeed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、ゆっくり戦う余裕なんてこっちもない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But we don't have the luxury to fight slowly either.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケッセルリンクを倒した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeated the demon Kesselring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死ぬ間際にメイド達とお別れ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Said farewell to the maids just before dying.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロレックス、アミトスがチュパ病から復帰
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rolex and Amitos recovered from Sucking Disease.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン軍は魔軍を撃退した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Helman army repelled the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昨夜の出来事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The events of last night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルとシーラからケッセルリンクの弱みを聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heard about Kesselring's weakness from Seel and Sheila.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰か不幸娘として侵入させて奴を殺す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Have someone infiltrate as the unlucky girl and kill him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ペルエレと目が合う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Caught eyes with Peruere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トランシルバニアの森
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The forest of Transylvania.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一人で放置されたペルエレ、ピンチになるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Peruere was left alone and got into trouble,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使徒メイド達に保護される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but was protected by the Apostle Maids.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数日が過ぎた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several days passed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使徒メイドと共に過ごしペルエレ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Peruere spent time with the Apostle Maids.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さらに数日が過ぎた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several more days passed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケッセルリンクに認められ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Peruere was recognized by the demon Kesselring,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使徒なったペルエレ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and became an Apostle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 充実した日々を過ごしペルエレの元に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Spent fulfilling days at Peruere's side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フレイアが現れ任務を告げる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Freya appeared and gave the mission.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ペルエレは魔人側に付く事を選んだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Peruere chose to side with the demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦成功を信じて侵入して来た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Believing the operation would succeed, infiltrated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は全滅する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others were annihilated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ペルエレの誘導で安全に侵入
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Safely infiltrated under Peruere’s guidance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メイド達は眠らされ、罠も解除
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maids were put to sleep and traps disarmed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンクは起きていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kesselring was awake.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 起きているケッセルリンク
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kesselring remains awake.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メイド達を捕まえる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Captured the maids.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン地区での戦況説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle situation report in the Helman district.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類側は押してはいるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Human forces are pushing forward, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 飛行魔物兵に手こずっていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were having trouble dealing with the flying demon soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がラングバウに到着した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and others arrived at Langbau.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首都に近寄る飛行魔物兵はシーラが撃墜
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheila shot down the flying demon soldiers approaching the capital.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数日前の出来事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Events from a few days ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルメイを倒したらクリームとセックス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Lemay is defeated, Cream and sex.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: という約束を強引にしていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Forced such a promise.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルメイは奥地に居て倒すの難しい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lemay is deep inside, making it difficult to defeat her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍をルメイと偽ってとか考える
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thought about pretending the demon general was Lemay.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とりあえずテニアン丘陵を目指す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For now, aim for the Tenian Hills.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、テニアンの魔軍陣地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, the demon army camp at Tenian.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルメイが最前線に視察に現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lemay appeared at the front lines for an inspection.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、テニアンの魔軍陣地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, at the demon army camp in Tenian.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルメイが傍若無人な屠殺を楽しんでいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lemay is enjoying a wanton slaughter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人破壊爆弾を積んだエノラゲイが飛び立つ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An Enola Gay loaded with human-destroying bombs takes off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 焼け落ちた町に入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Enter the burned-down town.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロレックス率いる５軍も同行
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The 5th army led by Rolex is also accompanying.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ５軍と共に移動中の魔人討伐隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon extermination squad moving with the 5th army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ニネティー村に向かう飛行魔物兵を見つける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Found flying demon soldiers heading to Ninety Village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ５軍と共に移動中の魔人討伐隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon extermination squad moving with the 5th army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バース村に向かう飛行魔物兵を見つける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Found flying demon soldiers heading to Bath Village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 町に向かう飛行魔物兵を発見
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Discovered flying demon soldiers heading for the town.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今度は１体だけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time, only one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ローレングラード
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, in Lawrengrad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人破壊爆弾投下
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Human-destroying bomb dropped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 都市壊滅
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: City devastated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: テニアン丘陵に到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at the Tenian Hills.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの策略を聞き、ロレックス怒る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rolex gets angry hearing about Rance's plan.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いや、そんな事はないぞ。よく見て見ろ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No, that's not the case. Take a good look.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昼間の戦いが長引けば長引くほど苦しくなるようだぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The longer the battle drags on during the day, the tougher it seems to become.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むむ・・確かに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm... indeed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、ゆっくり戦う余裕なんてこっちもない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But we don't have the luxury to fight slowly either.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケッセルリンクを倒した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeated the demon Kesselring.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 死ぬ間際にメイド達とお別れ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Said farewell to the maids just before dying.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロレックス、アミトスがチュパ病から復帰
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rolex and Amitos recovered from Sucking Disease.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン軍は魔軍を撃退した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Helman army repelled the demon army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 昨夜の出来事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The events of last night.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルとシーラからケッセルリンクの弱みを聞く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heard about Kesselring's weakness from Seel and Sheila.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰か不幸娘として侵入させて奴を殺す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Have someone infiltrate as the unlucky girl and kill him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ペルエレと目が合う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Caught eyes with Peruere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: トランシルバニアの森
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The forest of Transylvania.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一人で放置されたペルエレ、ピンチになるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Peruere was left alone and got into trouble,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使徒メイド達に保護される
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but was protected by the Apostle Maids.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数日が過ぎた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several days passed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使徒メイドと共に過ごしペルエレ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Peruere spent time with the Apostle Maids.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さらに数日が過ぎた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several more days passed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人ケッセルリンクに認められ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Peruere was recognized by the demon Kesselring,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 使徒なったペルエレ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and became an Apostle.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 充実した日々を過ごしペルエレの元に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Spent fulfilling days at Peruere's side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フレイアが現れ任務を告げる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Freya appeared and gave the mission.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ペルエレは魔人側に付く事を選んだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Peruere chose to side with the demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 作戦成功を信じて侵入して来た
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Believing the operation would succeed, infiltrated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達は全滅する
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others were annihilated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ペルエレの誘導で安全に侵入
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Safely infiltrated under Peruere’s guidance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メイド達は眠らされ、罠も解除
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maids were put to sleep and traps disarmed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ケッセルリンクは起きていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kesselring was awake.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 起きているケッセルリンク
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Kesselring remains awake.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦闘開始
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メイド達を捕まえる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Captured the maids.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン地区での戦況説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle situation report in the Helman district.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類側は押してはいるが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Human forces are pushing forward, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 飛行魔物兵に手こずっていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They were having trouble dealing with the flying demon soldiers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がラングバウに到着した
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and others arrived at Langbau.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 首都に近寄る飛行魔物兵はシーラが撃墜
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Sheila shot down the flying demon soldiers approaching the capital.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数日前の出来事
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Events from a few days ago.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルメイを倒したらクリームとセックス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Lemay is defeated, Cream and sex.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: という約束を強引にしていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Forced such a promise.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルメイは奥地に居て倒すの難しい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lemay is deep inside, making it difficult to defeat her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍をルメイと偽ってとか考える
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thought about pretending the demon general was Lemay.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とりあえずテニアン丘陵を目指す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For now, aim for the Tenian Hills.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、テニアンの魔軍陣地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, the demon army camp at Tenian.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルメイが最前線に視察に現れた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lemay appeared at the front lines for an inspection.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、テニアンの魔軍陣地
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, at the demon army camp in Tenian.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ルメイが傍若無人な屠殺を楽しんでいる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lemay is enjoying a wanton slaughter.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人破壊爆弾を積んだエノラゲイが飛び立つ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An Enola Gay loaded with human-destroying bombs takes off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 焼け落ちた町に入る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Enter the burned-down town.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ロレックス率いる５軍も同行
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The 5th army led by Rolex is also accompanying.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ５軍と共に移動中の魔人討伐隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon extermination squad moving with the 5th army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ニネティー村に向かう飛行魔物兵を見つける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Found flying demon soldiers heading to Ninety Village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ５軍と共に移動中の魔人討伐隊
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon extermination squad moving with the 5th army.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: バース村に向かう飛行魔物兵を見つける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Found flying demon soldiers heading to Bath Village.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 町に向かう飛行魔物兵を発見
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Discovered flying demon soldiers heading for the town.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今度は１体だけ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This time, only one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その頃、ローレングラード
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, in Lawrengrad.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人破壊爆弾投下
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Human-destroying bomb dropped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 都市壊滅
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: City devastated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: テニアン丘陵に到着
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at the Tenian Hills.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの策略を聞き、ロレックス怒る
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rolex gets angry hearing about Rance's plan.
